Instance Method# setBuildConfiguration(_:buildHandler:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac CatalysttvOSvisionOS

```
@MainActor @preconcurrency
func setBuildConfiguration(
    _ configuration: UIMainMenuSystem.Configuration,
    buildHandler: ((any UIMenuBuilder) -> Void)? = nil
)
```

## [See Also](/documentation/UIKit/UIMainMenuSystem/setBuildConfiguration(_:buildHandler:)#see-also)

### [Configuring a main menu system](/documentation/UIKit/UIMainMenuSystem/setBuildConfiguration(_:buildHandler:)#Configuring-a-main-menu-system)

[`class Configuration`](/documentation/uikit/uimainmenusystem/configuration)A configuration for the main menu system. You can specify whether or not certain elements are present in the initial main menu, as well as a block to build the menu using a UIMenuBuilder.
